dishes,"},{"lineNumber":115273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦争中はよく火炎と一緒に","translatedEnglishLine":"  and during the war, I often cooked meals for the demons together with Kaen."},{"lineNumber":115274,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物達へのご飯を作ってたんですよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":115275,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なるほど……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see..."},{"lineNumber":115276,"originalJapaneseLine":"　兵共が並ぶわけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"  That’s why so many soldiers are lining battlefield, this kind of comfort..."},{"lineNumber":115279,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当に貴重ですから」","translatedEnglishLine":"  is truly precious.\""},{"lineNumber":115280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ハウゼル殿が作り、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Made by Lord Howzer,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿もん、総統閣下様であらせられる俺が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fool, I am His Excellency the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木っ端の兵どもと同じものが食えるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how could I eat the same thing as these lowly soldiers!"
"That's what I'd like to say, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には同じものを食うのも大事だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes it's important to eat the same food as others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は炊き出しの飯を食うぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, I'm going to eat the meal from the food distribution."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炊き出しご飯、お好きですものね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you do like the food from the relief kitchens, don't you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人を貧乏舌みたいに言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't say it as if I have a poor palate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなこと言ってないです……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking over at the distribution point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不自然なほど長蛇の列が一列だけあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was an unnaturally long single queue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の二倍、や、三倍はあるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's twice, no, three times as long as the others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のとこならすぐご飯頂けるのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I could get rice quickly at other places,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆さんここに並んでますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but everyone is lining up here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっととんでもない美味いものを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must be serving something incredibly delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食べられるまで時間がかかりますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it will take some time until we can eat…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ並ばにゃならんのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: go out of my way to stand in line?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、ぐすっ……当たり前のように……」
「うう、ランス様、割り込みは駄目ですよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, Lord Rance, cutting in line is no good..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 列の最前列まで進むと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When he moved up to the very front of the line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大鍋の前で食事を配給しているハウゼルがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was Howzer distributing meals in front of a large pot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧の通り、炊き出しのお手伝いに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see, I'm helping out with the food distribution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、簡単な料理なら出来ますし、
戦争中はよく火炎と一緒に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and during the war, I often cooked meals for the demons together with Kaen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達へのご飯を作ってたんですよ？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why so many soldiers are lining up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦場では、この手の癒やしは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the battlefield, this kind of comfort...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿もん、総統閣下様であらせられる俺が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fool, I am His Excellency the Supreme Commander,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 木っ端の兵どもと同じものが食えるか！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: how could I eat the same thing as these lowly soldiers!"
"That's what I'd like to say, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時には同じものを食うのも大事だな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: sometimes it's important to eat the same food as others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日は炊き出しの飯を食うぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, I'm going to eat the meal from the food distribution."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 炊き出しご飯、お好きですものね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you do like the food from the relief kitchens, don't you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「人を貧乏舌みたいに言うな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't say it as if I have a poor palate."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなこと言ってないです……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking over at the distribution point,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 不自然なほど長蛇の列が一列だけあった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was an unnaturally long single queue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の二倍、や、三倍はあるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it's twice, no, three times as long as the others."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他のとこならすぐご飯頂けるのに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I could get rice quickly at other places,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆さんここに並んでますよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but everyone is lining up here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: きっととんでもない美味いものを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They must be serving something incredibly delicious.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食べられるまで時間がかかりますが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it will take some time until we can eat…"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: わざわざ並ばにゃならんのだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: go out of my way to stand in line?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ、ぐすっ……当たり前のように……」
「うう、ランス様、割り込みは駄目ですよぉ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh, Lord Rance, cutting in line is no good..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 列の最前列まで進むと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When he moved up to the very front of the line,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大鍋の前で食事を配給しているハウゼルがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there was Howzer distributing meals in front of a large pot.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ご覧の通り、炊き出しのお手伝いに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As you can see, I'm helping out with the food distribution.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい、簡単な料理なら出来ますし、
戦争中はよく火炎と一緒に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and during the war, I often cooked meals for the demons together with Kaen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物達へのご飯を作ってたんですよ？」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s why so many soldiers are lining up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦場では、この手の癒やしは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the battlefield, this kind of comfort...
